author: m.kalinin
content: Is your builder software currently accounts for competing forks, i.e. attempts to build on top of every viable head that is available?

author: metachris_
content: yes, the Flashbots builder does that

author: terence0083
content: Does anyone know if the builder or relayer inserts their own `extra_data` to make them identifiable?

author: metachris_
content: builders usually do, but it's not reliable to identify relays as they might (and will) change without warning. for example, this is a block from Flashbots: https://sepolia.etherscan.io/block/0xb085578b87cb05cf76eb437c50bebe4785e8e3c13a9064ede7592787e1039c55 (we've changed our extra data) and this is one by bloXroute: https://goerli.etherscan.io/block/0x1ac21ee70596bf8ed6e86e850aafc2ccbd5885ee6ce42d517927abd3d76fb1a4
